channel.title: "We've got hostiles" scripting oversight (the scientist must die) [Fixed]
channel.description:
Presented in form of a short illustrated story...
[url]https://imgur.com/a/4apdu[/url]
Also of course if you leg it to the door, getting through before it closes you have no chance to get back again since you can't kill the scientist.

item.title: "We've got hostiles" scripting oversight (the scientist must die) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
me too.

I also miss being able to save the scientist in Office Complex who was being eaten by a barnacle. It would lift him up, and you could shoot it and save him, but the way source does barnacles, they instantly kill any actor they pick up

oggyb:

Like the guy who gets attacked by his zombie colleague behind the gauze door. Can’t kill the zombie til he’s done his business.

I can kill that zombie fine

Read full topic
